trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'accesso alle funzionalità di un motore di sintesi vocale installata.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un nuovo oggetto SpeechSynthesizer, utilizza la voce di sistema predefinito.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare il SpeechSynthesizer per utilizzare una delle voci (sintesi vocale) di sintesi vocale installata, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sulle voci installate, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metodo e la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe fornisce anche i seguenti aspetti di sintesi vocale controllo:: per configurare l'output per l'oggetto SpeechSynthesizer, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per generare il riconoscimento vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Il SpeechSynthesizer può produrre vocale da testo, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>oggetto, o da [vocale sintesi Markup Language (SSML) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Per sospendere e riprendere la sintesi vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Per aggiungere o rimuovere i dizionari, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: Il SpeechSynthesizer può usare uno o più dizionari per la pronuncia delle parole.

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Per modificare il recapito dei messaggi di output vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: Il SpeechSynthesizer genera eventi quando viene rilevato alcune funzionalità nei prompt: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Genera anche gli eventi che indicano all'avvio (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) e di fine (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) di parlare di operazioni e sulla modifica della voce (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento al SpeechSynthesizer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama l'oggetto di SpeechSynthesizer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando si inizializza un nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>istanza, viene utilizzata la voce di sistema predefinito.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>per utilizzare una delle voci (sintesi vocale) di sintesi vocale installata, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sulle voci installate, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metodo e la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un dizionario per la <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Un dizionario di pronuncia è una raccolta di parole o frasi con le pronunce, costituiti da lettere e caratteri di un alfabeto fonetico supportato.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare un dizionario per specificare la pronuncia personalizzata per il vocabolario specializzato nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Pronuncia specificata in un file di lessico esterno hanno la precedenza sulla pronuncia del lessico interno del sintetizzatore vocale o di un dizionario.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, la pronuncia specificate inline nei prompt creato con uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>metodi hanno la precedenza su pronunce specificati in qualsiasi lessico.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Pronuncia inline si applica solo a una singola occorrenza di una parola.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [dizionari e caratteri dell'alfabeto fonetico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere più dizionari a un oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>. Due valori sono attualmente supportati per il `mediaType` parametro:-il valore `application/pls+xml` indica che il dizionario è conforme al [pronuncia lessico specifica (PLS) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il formato preferito da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -Il valore `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indica che il formato di lessico lessico non compresso, ovvero un formato proprietario di Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Questo è un formato legacy, è consigliabile utilizzare il formato PLS descritto in precedenza.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: La posizione delle informazioni di lessico.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di supporti del lessico.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: I valori di tipo di supporto non sono tra maiuscole e minuscole.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> rileva un segnalibro in un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>l'evento viene generato durante l'elaborazione di uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere segnalibri utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto e rilascia risorse utilizzate durante la sessione.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una misura per pulire le risorse nel caso in cui il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>non viene chiamato.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la richiesta che il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> è generale.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto messaggio di richiesta che attualmente parlata.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce tutti i vocale installata voci sintesi (sintesi vocale).

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Una voce è un motore di sintesi vocale (sintesi vocale o TTS) che viene installato nel sistema.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di sola lettura delle voci attualmente installati nel sistema.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce tutto il riconoscimento vocale installata voci sintesi (sintesi vocale) che supportano una lingua specifica.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Se nessuna parte del supporto voci installate le impostazioni locali specificate, questo metodo restituisce una raccolta vuota.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e l'API Speech accettare tutti i codici paese di lingua validi.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire la sintesi vocale utilizzando la lingua specificata nella proprietà delle impostazioni cultura, deve essere installato un motore di sintesi vocale che supporta codice paese di linguaggio.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Motori di sintesi vocale fornita con il lavoro di Microsoft Windows 7 con i seguenti codici di lingua, paese:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Stati Uniti) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Cina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Sono inoltre consentiti i codici di lingua cinese (Taiwan) a due lettere, ad esempio "en".

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni locali che deve supportare la voce.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di sola lettura delle voci attualmente installati nel sistema che supportano le impostazioni locali specificate.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Sospende il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando viene raggiunto un fonema.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: Un fonema è un componente di base del linguaggio scritto, in genere una lettera di un carattere alfabetico (o la combinazione di due lettere) che rappresenta uno o più suoni distinti.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, la lettera "c" è un fonema che può sembrare come "s" in "considerato", oppure come "k" in "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Una parola scritta è una raccolta di fonemi.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Modifica di una parola un fonema comporta la modifica senza errori di digitazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>istanza genera un evento PhonemeReached per ogni parte di una parola che costituisce un fonema.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per la parola "tema" generano tre eventi PhonemeReached; uno per il suono "th", uno per il suono "e" e uno per il suono di "m" (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio e informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la velocità di pronuncia il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la velocità di pronuncia del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto, da -10 a 10.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove una libreria di oggetti dal <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>per un esempio.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del documento lessico.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Riprende il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto dopo che è stata sospesa.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Seleziona una voce specifica in base al nome.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>(metodo) e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>installato di classe per ottenere i nomi delle voci di sintesi vocale (TTS) che è possibile selezionare.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare una voce, passare l'intero contenuto del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>proprietà come argomento per il metodo SelectVoice.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>oggetto seleziona la prima voce installata contenente `name` la voce <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>esegue un confronto tra maiuscole e minuscole, di sottostringa per determinare se la voce corrisponde la `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'applicazione chiama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, il metodo verifica che ciascuna delle voci nel Registro di sistema rileva soddisfi determinati criteri minimi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Per qualsiasi voce che si verifica un errore di verifica, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>Imposta relativo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>proprietà `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione non è possibile selezionare una voce il cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>proprietà `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, le applicazioni non verranno impostata una voce <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare una voce per sesso, età o delle impostazioni locali, utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della voce da selezionare.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender.
trans-unit.target: Seleziona una voce con un sesso specifico.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>oggetto seleziona la prima voce installata cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>proprietà corrispondenze di `gender` parametro.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Conta le corrispondenze individua e restituisce la voce quando il conteggio è uguale al `voiceAlternate` parametro.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e l'API Speech accettare tutti i codici paese di lingua validi.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire utilizzando la lingua specificata sintesi il `culture` parametro, un motore di sintesi vocale che supporta che deve essere installato il codice paese di linguaggio.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Motori di sintesi vocale fornita con il lavoro di Microsoft Windows 7 con i seguenti codici di lingua, paese:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Stati Uniti) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Cina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Sono inoltre consentiti i codici di lingua cinese (Taiwan) a due lettere, ad esempio "en".

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to append output to an audio stream.

trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto che contiene il contenuto di parlare.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Annulla l'operazione asincrona sintesi di un messaggio in coda.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare questo metodo per annullare asincrono parlare di operazione per gli elementi seguenti:-il contenuto di un <xref:System.String>specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -Il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Il contenuto di un <xref:System.String>contenente SSML specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System. Speech crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>dell'oggetto e viene popolato con il contenuto del parametro del metodo e restituisce il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Se si mantiene una copia dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, passarlo in SpeakAsyncCancel annullare pronuncia contenuto specificato un <xref:System.String>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto per il quale annullare un'operazione di speak.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Annulla le operazioni di sintesi vocale asincrono, tutti in coda.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> parlare di una richiesta di completamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Genera l'evento SpeakCompleted al completamento di uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>non dispone di proprietà di classe e non restituisce dati dall'evento SpeakCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito per consentire agli autori di applicazioni come scrivere gestori eventi per l'evento SpeakCompleted.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato dopo che il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> pronuncia ogni singola parola di una richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genera questo evento per ogni nuovo termine che parla in un prompt dei comandi utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genera questo evento quando avvia l'elaborazione di un prompt dei comandi utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>non dispone di proprietà di classe e non restituisce dati dall'evento SpeakStarted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito per consentire agli autori di applicazioni come scrivere gestori eventi per l'evento SpeakStarted.

trans-unit.target: Restituisce lo stato corrente di pronuncia del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.target: Generato quando lo stato del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genera questo evento quando la pronuncia <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>le modifiche.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per sospendere e riprendere la sintesi vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando viene raggiunto un viseme.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Un viseme è la posizione di base della bocca e faccia mentre un fonema si.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes sono rappresentazioni visive delle fonemi.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System. Speech supporta 21 visemes per l'inglese Americano, ognuno dei quali corrisponde a uno o più fonemi.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: VisemeReached eventi vengono generati quando un nuovo fonema raggiunto ha un diverso viseme corrispondente di fonema precedente raggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Poiché alcuni visemes rappresentano più fonema, non viene generato un evento VisemeReached se il fonema successivo raggiunto corrisponde alla viseme stesso come il fonema precedente.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per le parole "questa zona", un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>evento viene generato per la "s" in "this" e "z" in "zona".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, un evento VisemeReached non viene generato per la "z" in "zona" poiché corrisponde alla stessa viseme come la "s" in "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: Di seguito è un elenco dei gruppi fonema che corrispondono a un viseme in inglese e 21 fonemi SAPI.

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | inattività | |&1; | ae, ax, ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | nuova, eh, | |&5; | er | |&6; | y, iy, quali, ix | |&7; | w, uw | |&8; | Mostra | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s, z | |&16; | sh, ch, jh, zh | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k, g o GN | |&21; | p, m e b | Per informazioni sui dati associati con la `VisemeReached` eventi, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene informazioni sulla voce corrente del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando si inizializza un nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, Usa la voce di sistema predefinito.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>oggetto per utilizzare una delle voci di sintesi vocale installata, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sulle voci installate, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metodo e la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni sulla voce corrente del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando la voce del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio e informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare la voce che il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>viene utilizzato con qualsiasi il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metodi o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il volume di output del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il volume del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, compreso tra 0 e 100.
